Hexblast.name: Hexblast
Hexblast.flavor: You scream an eerie curse that harms your enemies’ minds more than their ears.
Hexblast.effect: You can place your Warlock’s Curse on the target.
Hexblast.onHit: 1d8 + Charisma or Constitution modifier psychic damage.

Vengeful Hex.name: Vengeful Hex
Vengeful Hex.flavor: You balefully eye the enemy who shot you. The creature might think itself beyond your reach, but it’s wrong.
Vengeful Hex.trigger: An enemy hits or misses you with a ranged or area attack
Vengeful Hex.effect: You place your Warlock’s Curse on the target.

Hex of Abandonment.name: Hex of Abandonment
Hex of Abandonment.flavor: Your foe imagines that you and your allies are manifestations of its worst nightmare that have come to torment and murder it.
Hex of Abandonment.onHit: 3d10 + Charisma or Constitution modifier psychic damage.
Hex of Abandonment.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can place your Warlock’s Curse on each enemy that ends its turn adjacent to the target, and that enemy takes 2d6 damage when you curse it.
